lines.text: Mr. Preston, this operation will be a failure if we all die!
Boy, you're gonna be busier than a three-peckered goat.
one, whoever sees the other person first is the winner; two, whoever gets seen first is toast.
When we have mastered these tactics, we will use them to seek out and confront the forces of evil and kill 'em deader than hell!
[to Brad Little]
Well that's very big of you, Little.
I AM THE GREATEST!
Time to throw the dog a bone, Breaker.
[Jake is trying to rescue Guthrie from Stoller]
You're not touching her you filthy piece of shit!
Oops. You blew it.

Little's pre mission pep talk to Preston describing what he expects of his protégé "... a 1st class all American hero with his heart & brain wired together cooking full tilt boogie for freedom & justice!"

[commiserating with Jake after he fails a test]
It's like sex,hardly anyone gets it right the first time.
Make that damn thing go away son!
Breaker, strawberry gum?
No
How about you, sir, strawberry gum?

[angrily]
No!

[dead pan]
It's delicious?

[demonstrating Apache's capabilities to Preston]
You could crash this thing at twenty G's and survive but I am NOT going to prove it to you!
Darn.
